verses.name: Mark 10:15
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child, he shall not enter therein.

verses.name: Mark 10:16
verses.text: And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.

verses.name: Mark 10:17
verses.text: And when he was gone forth into the way, there came one running, and kneeled to him, and asked him, Good Master, what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life?

verses.name: Mark 10:18
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
